availability.p: The text of the original item is in the public domain. The text encoding and editorial notes were created and/or prepared by the Walt Whitman Archive and are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License (CC BY 4.0). notesStmt.note: No image of verso currently available; according to the New York Public Library, the verso is blank.
Whitman's dates within these notes suggest that this manuscript was composed in February or April 1863, or that parts of this manuscript were composed during each of these months.
The following are responsible for particular readings or for changes to this file, as noted: Elizabeth Lorang Ashley Lawson Tim Jackson

body.ab: bed 41 Daniel Sullivan Co. F. 1st Penn Rifleman—is from Easton Penn Irish h—has been two years in service—left leg amputated, a quiet soldierly fellow—Dr. of the Ward Dr. Bartlett—
